issue.message: Call requires API level 27 (current min is 14): `android.app.Activity#setTurnScreenOn`
Call requires API level 27 (current min is 14): `android.app.Activity#setShowWhenLocked`

This call references a method added in API level 17; however, the containing class androidx.mediarouter.app.MediaRouteDynamicControllerDialog is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
